General.Name: Bridgepoint Group Plc
General.Description: Bridgepoint Group plc operates as a private equity and credit fund manager in Europe, the United States, and China. The company invests in the middle market private assets. It specialises and invests in private equity and credit internationally across advanced industrials, technology, business and financial services, and healthcare sectors. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 95 Wigmore Street, London, United Kingdom, W1U 1FB
